name: MPMediaItemCollection
desc: A sorted set of media items from the media library.

items.name: init(items: [MPMediaItem])
items.desc: Initializes a media item collection with an array of media items.

items.name: var items: [MPMediaItem]
items.desc: The media items in a media item collection.

items.name: var representativeItem: MPMediaItem?
items.desc: A media item whose properties are representative of the other media items in a collection.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of media items in a collection.

items.name: var mediaTypes: MPMediaType
items.desc: The types of the media items in a collection.
